title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 62.2 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 62.2 - Exceptions

State Regulations

Beer may be sold, served or delivered at such an open
window, stand or counter on such premises where located at a seashore, summer
resort or in rural areas; and elsewhere with the permission of the authority
first granted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
62.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
